creator: jlpoole56@gmail.com
text:
On Gentoo Linux, downloaded high watermark and build fails.

hip batik # uname -a
Linux hip 2.6.38-gentoo-r6 #3 SMP Wed Sep 14 17:16:28 PDT 2011 i686 Intel(R) Core(TM)2 Duo CPU E6550 @ 2.33GHz GenuineIntel GNU/Linux
hip batik # ant -version
Apache Ant version 1.8.1 compiled on July 13 2010
hip batik # java -version
java version "1.6.0_29"
Java(TM) SE Runtime Environment (build 1.6.0_29-b11)
Java HotSpot(TM) Server VM (build 20.4-b02, mixed mode)
hip batik # javac -version
javac 1.6.0_29
hip batik # 
hip batik # svn info
Path: .
URL: http://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/xmlgraphics/fop/trunk
Repository Root: http://svn.apache.org/repos/asf
Repository UUID: 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68
Revision: 1225602
Node Kind: directory
Schedule: normal
Last Changed Author: vhennebert
Last Changed Rev: 1221326
Last Changed Date: 2011-12-20 08:03:29 -0800 (Tue, 20 Dec 2011)

hip batik # ant clean 
Buildfile: /usr/local/src/batik/build.xml
Trying to override old definition of task javac
Trying to override old definition of task junit

clean:
   [delete] Deleting directory /usr/local/src/batik/build

BUILD SUCCESSFUL
Total time: 1 second
hip batik # ant all      
Buildfile: /usr/local/src/batik/build.xml
Trying to override old definition of task javac
Trying to override old definition of task junit
